name: The Dungeon (itch) (foxxi)
description:
Brave the Dungeon and emerge victorious.

Controls
Movement with WASD
Click on abilities to use them

Created for GMTK 2021. The theme for the Jam was "Joined Together", in this game your actions are linked to the dungeon master's timeline forcing you to consider each action very carefully since you might accelerate the dangers of the dungeon too fast by using your abilities carelessly.

Maybe a bit of a liberal interpretation than what is allowed, but hey ;)

When starting the game for the first time it might load for a long time. I have no idea why this is the case.
